Minogue confirms engagement

Singer Kylie Minogue announced on Saturday that she is engaged to actor Joshua Sasse.

Minogue, 47, and her 28-year-old boyfriend made the announcement with a notice in the marriages section of Saturday’s Daily Telegraph .

The engagement confirmation was placed under the names Mr JS von Sasse and Miss KA Minogue.

Sasse previously sparked engagement rumours after he referred to Minogue as his “fiancee” during the NME Awards after party on Wednesday, where Minogue was showing off a huge diamond ring.

The pair first met on the set of Sasse’s show Galavant in September, 2015. — IANS
title: Kylie Minogue announces engagement to Joshua Sasse
